intro: Seseli articulatum, commonly known as the articulated seseli, is a flowering plant in the Apiaceae family. It is characterized by its finely divided, fern-like leaves and small, yellowish-green flowers that appear in umbels. The plant typically grows in rocky or gravelly soils and is often found in mountainous regions. It has a compact growth habit and is sometimes cultivated for its ornamental value. Seseli articulatum is also known for its medicinal properties in traditional herbal medicine.
